verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, to <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%>, whose right <S%H3225>hand<s%> I have <S%H2388>held<s%>, to <S%H7286>subdue<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6605>him<s%>; and I will loose the <S%H4975>body<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>, to <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him the two leaved <S%H1817>gates<s%>; and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%>;

I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3474>you<s%>, and make the crooked <S%H1921>places<s%> <S%H3474>straight<s%>: I will break in <S%H7665>pieces<s%> the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of <S%H5154>brass<s%>, and cut in <S%H1438>pieces<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>:

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and hidden <S%H4301>riches<s%> of secret <S%H4565>places<s%>, that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I<s%>, the Lord, which <S%H7121>call<s%> you by your <S%H8034>name<s%>, am the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H3478>sake<s%>, and Israel my <S%H972>elect<s%>, I have even <S%H7121>called<s%> you by your <S%H8034>name<s%>: I have <S%H3655>surnamed<s%> <S%H3045>you<s%>, though you have not known me.
I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and there is none <S%H430>else<s%>, there is no God <S%H2108>beside<s%> <S%H247>me<s%>: I girded <S%H3045>you<s%>, though you have not known me:

That they may <S%H3045>know<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, and from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, that there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>. I am the Lord, and there is none else.

I <S%H3335>form<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%>, and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%>: I <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> do all these <S%H6213>things<s%>.

Drop <S%H7491>down<s%>, you <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, from <S%H4605>above<s%>, and let the <S%H7834>skies<s%> pour <S%H5140>down<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%>, and let them bring <S%H6509>forth<s%> <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, and let <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> spring <S%H6779>up<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> have created <S%H1254>it<s%>.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto him that <S%H7378>strives<s%> with his <S%H3335>Maker<s%>! Let the <S%H2789>potsherd<s%> argue with the <S%H2789>potsherds<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>. Shall the <S%H2563>clay<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to him that <S%H3335>fashions<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, What make <S%H6467>you<s%>? or your work, He has no <S%H3027>hands<s%>?
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto him that <S%H559>says<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, What <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H802>you<s%>? or to the woman, What have you brought <S%H2342>forth<s%>?

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and his <S%H3335>Maker<s%>, <S%H7592>Ask<s%> me of things to <S%H857>come<s%> concerning my <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and concerning the <S%H6467>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> command you <S%H6680>me<s%>.

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> upon <S%H3027>it<s%>: I, even my hands, have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and all their <S%H6635>army<s%> have I <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

I have raised him <S%H5782>up<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and I will <S%H3474>direct<s%> all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>: he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H5892>city<s%>, and he shall let <S%H7971>go<s%> my <S%H1546>captives<s%>, not for <S%H4242>price<s%> nor <S%H7810>reward<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, The <S%H3018>labor<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H5505>merchandise<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> and of the <S%H5436>Sabeans<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4060>stature<s%>, shall come <S%H5674>over<s%> unto <S%H3212>you<s%>, and they shall be your: they shall come <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2131>you<s%>; in chains they shall come <S%H5674>over<s%>, and they shall fall <S%H7812>down<s%> unto <S%H6419>you<s%>, they shall make supplication unto <S%H410>you<s%>, saying, Surely God is in <S%H657>you<s%>; and there is none else, there is no <S%H430>God<s%>.
<S%H403>Truly<s%> you are a <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H430>yourself<s%>, O God of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H3467>Savior<s%>.

They shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, and also <S%H3637>confounded<s%>, all of <S%H1980>them<s%>: they shall go to <S%H3639>confusion<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that are <S%H2796>makers<s%> of <S%H6736>idols<s%>.

But <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with a <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%>: you shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> nor <S%H3637>confounded<s%> <S%H5769>world<s%> without <S%H5703>end<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; <S%H430>God<s%> himself that <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3559>it<s%>; he has established <S%H1254>it<s%>, he created it not <S%H8414>void<s%>, he <S%H3335>formed<s%> it to be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and there is none else.

I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%>, in a <S%H2822>dark<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: I <S%H559>said<s%> not unto the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H1245>Seek<s%> you me in <S%H8414>vain<s%>: I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, I <S%H5046>declare<s%> things that are <S%H4339>right<s%>.

<S%H6908>Assemble<s%> yourselves and <S%H935>come<s%>; draw <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, you that are <S%H6412>escaped<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: they have no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> that set <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of their engraved <S%H6459>image<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> unto a <S%H410>god<s%> that cannot <S%H3467>save<s%>.

<S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H5066>you<s%>, and bring them near; <S%H3289>Yes<s%>, let them take counsel <S%H3162>together<s%>: who has <S%H8085>declared<s%> this from ancient <S%H6924>time<s%>? who has <S%H5046>told<s%> it from that <S%H3068>time<s%>? have not I the Lord? and there is no <S%H430>God<s%> else <S%H1107>beside<s%> <S%H6662>me<s%>; a just <S%H410>God<s%> and a <S%H3467>Savior<s%>; there is <S%H369>none<s%> beside <S%H2108>me<s%>.
<S%H6437>Look<s%> unto <S%H3467>me<s%>, and be you saved, all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: for I am <S%H410>God<s%>, and there is none else.

I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H1697>myself<s%>, the word is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>, That unto me every <S%H1290>knee<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow<s%>, every <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

<S%H559>Surely<s%>, shall one say, in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> have I <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H5797>strength<s%>: even to him shall men <S%H935>come<s%>; and all that are <S%H2734>incensed<s%> against him shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>.
In the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall all the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6663>justified<s%>, and shall <S%H1984>glory<s%>.
